snippet: Beverly Hall, the former superintendent who was awaiting trial for her alleged participation in a conspiracy to alter test results, died Monday after a battle with breast cancer, her legal team said.
abstract: Legal team of Beverly L Hall, former superintendent of Atlanta public schools who was awaiting criminal trial for her alleged involvement in conspiracy to change students' standardized test results, says she has died after suffering from breast cancer.
lead_paragraph: Beverly Hall, the former superintendent who was awaiting trial for her alleged participation in a conspiracy to alter test results, died Monday after a battle with breast cancer, her legal team said.

headline.main: Central Figure in the Atlanta Schools Cheating Scandal Dies
headline.print_headline: Central Figure in the Atlanta Schools Cheating Scandal Dies
